Ability.Name: Treasure Magnet
Ability.Description: Automatically scoops up nearby prizes for you. Multi-install the ability to increase range.

Ability.Name: HP Prize Plus
Ability.Description: Increases the number of HP prizes enemies drop. Multi-install the ability for even more prizes.

Ability.Name: Link Prize Plus
Ability.Description: Increases the number of D-Link prizes enemies drop. Multi-install the ability for even more prizes.

Ability.Name: Lucky Strike
Ability.Description: Increases the number of prize boxes enemies drop. Multi-install the ability for even more prizes.

Ability.Name: HP Boost
Ability.Description: Increases your HP. Multi-install the ability to bump it up even further. (Adds 10%, rounded down.)

Ability.Name: Fire Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your Fire commands. Multi-install the ability to deal even more damage.

Ability.Name: Blizzard Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your Blizzard commands. Multi-install the ability to deal even more damage.

Ability.Name: Thunder Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your Thunder commands. Multi-install the ability to deal even more damage.

Ability.Name: Cure Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the amount of HP you recover with Cure commands. Multi-install the ability to recover even more.

Ability.Name: Item Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the effectiveness of recovery item commands. Multi-install the ability for an even larger improvement.

Ability.Name: Attack Haste
Ability.Description: Shortens the reload time for all attack commands installed in your deck. Multi-install the ability for even quicker reloading.

Ability.Name: Magic Haste
Ability.Description: Shortens the reload time for all magic commands installed in your deck. Multi-install the ability for even quicker reloading.

Ability.Name: Combo Finish Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the damage dealt by the last blow of your combos. Multi-install the ability to deal even more damage.

Ability.Name: Finish Boost
Ability.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your Finish command. Multi-install the ability to deal even more damage.

Ability.Name: Fire Screen
Ability.Description: Increases your resistance to Fire attacks. Multi-install the ability to bump it up even further. +20% per level.

Ability.Name: Blizzard Screen
Ability.Description: Increases your resistance to Blizzard attacks (20%). Multi-install the ability to bump it up even further. +20% per level.

Ability.Name: Thunder Screen
Ability.Description: Increases your resistance to Thunder attacks (20%). Multi-install the ability to bump it up even further. +20% per level.

Ability.Name: Dark Screen
Ability.Description: Increases your resistance to darkness-based attacks (20%). Multi-install the ability to bump it up even further. +20% per level.

Ability.Name: Reload Boost
Ability.Description: Shortens the reload time for all commands installed in your deck whenever your HP falls below 25%.

Ability.Name: Defender
Ability.Description: Increases your Defense whenever your HP falls below 25%.

Ability.Name: Combo Plus
Ability.Description: Adds one stroke to your ground combos. Multi-install the ability for even longer combos.

Ability.Name: Air Combo Plus
Ability.Description: Adds one stroke to your aerial combos. Multi-install the ability for even longer combos.

Ability.Name: Exp Chance
Ability.Description: Doubles the EXP you receive whenever your HP falls below 25%.

Ability.Name: Exp Walker
Ability.Description: Awards you 1 EXP for every step you take.

Ability.Name: Damage Syphon
Ability.Description: Restores some of the Focus Gauge when you take damage.

Ability.Name: Second Chance
Ability.Description: Ensures you always retain 1 HP after an attack that would otherwise finish you off, unless you are already down to 1 HP.

Ability.Name: Once More
Ability.Description: Ensures you always retain 1 HP throughout a combo that would otherwise finish you off, unless you are already at 1 HP when the first attack hits.

Ability.Name: Scan
Ability.Description: Displays the HP of the targeted enemy.

Ability.Name: Leaf Bracer
Ability.Description: Prevents you from taking damage while using Cure commands.

Crystal.Name: Wellspring
Crystal.Ability: Combo Plus OR Air Combo Plus

Crystal.Name: Abounding
Crystal.Ability: Link Prize Plus OR EXP Chance

Crystal.Name: Abounding
Crystal.Ability: Link Prize Plus OR EXP Chance

Crystal.Name: Abounding
Crystal.Ability: Link Prize Plus OR EXP Chance

Crystal.Name: Abounding
Crystal.Ability: Link Prize Plus OR EXP Chance
